Reviews.Title: nokia asha 300
Reviews.Author: aaehlmopstu
Reviews.Content: i use a cell phone very little and probably only get less than 4 calls per month.  i make even less calls.  i bought this phone primarily for its music capability.  i also use the fm radio occasionally.  i like the 5.0 mega pixel camera.  for me a great phone, for you...what you see is what you get.  remember, this is a symbian operating system, not an android.  take it from there.  good luck.

Reviews.Title: perfect for me :0)
Reviews.Author: adriana spiecker
Reviews.Content: i bought this phone a year ago and it is still running great!!! a few scratches on the number 3 and 7 but thats because of my fingernail from texting too much...... i love this phone and color :0).....i would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Device stopped working after 3 month
Reviews.Author: Mark K.
Reviews.Content: The phone was brand new, worked fine for 3 month and then died, today Nokia is not what it was 5 years ago

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Pasky
Reviews.Content: So far everything works fine..Screen is excellent and battery life is great for now....5MP camera takes clean and crisp pics...

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Esteban Javier Garcia Guillen
Reviews.Content: cool very nice fast shiping and best quality the item is same for the photo and descrpticon , recomend ,

Reviews.Title: I returned this -
Reviews.Author: elfks "elfks"
Reviews.Content: Messaging was almost impossible to use - for me and for others who tried to show me "how easy it is".  I strongly suspect this phone has been recycled from some other country as it had what appeared to be arabic characters on the keys.  And although my return was authorized and I paid the postage to return it, my refund was $10 short.  So apparently, I paid sales tax on something I didn't buy or they charged me for shipping I''d already paid for.  What a rip!
